reviews.review_msg: Jillian is a very nice teacher. You can tell she enjoys teaching it. Although the videos she shows are interesting, I found her class pretty boring. I rarely listened. Her tests are short, but make sure you know your material!

Awesome professor, enthusiastic and will give everyone an A if you show that you're interested and understand material. Basically no homework in her class; but it is important to attend classes because she shows interesting material throughout the semester.
